channel.title: Projects on Shang-Yi Chuang
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Shang-Yi Chuang

item.title: Taiwan Mandarin speech with video (TMSV)
item.description: TMSV is an audio-visual dataset based on the script of TMHINT (Taiwan Mandarin hearing in noise test).

item.title: Smooth and Flexible Movement Control of a Robot Arm
item.description: Realizing human behavior on a robot arm based on a nonlinear reference shaping controller in order to create robots which can share a safe working environment with humans.

item.title: Flyback Converter
item.description: Practice of PCB designing and welding.

item.title: ME Robot Cup
item.description: The ME Robot Cup is a traditional annual event at the Department of Mechanical Engineering, NTU.
